knimeNode.name: Isotope Manager
knimeNode.shortDescription: Deisotopes the spectra or filters the isotopes using isotope annotations.

fullDescription.intro: The node deisotopes the spectra by removing the isotope profiles. Alternatively, the spectra can be filtered for isotopes. I.e., only profiles with isotopes are kept. In addition, all detected adducts of the major isotope peak are kept as well. Isotopes can be detected using the "Isotope Finder" node.
fullDescription.option: If the annotated isotopes should be extracted.
If the annotated isotopes should be removed.

ports.outPort: Table containing deisotoped / filtered Spectra data.
